fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Steal evidence from a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your name does not show up when the Rebel Flag is flying.
- You block your target from receiving any feedback.
- This includes results such as Town Investigative results, as well as Town Protective messages, roleblock messages, attack messages, failed attack messages, Coven Leader/Witch messages, etc.
- If you are targeted by a Sheriff or Investigator, you will have the results of your target.
- If you visit no one, your true results will appear.
- Being risen by a Retributionist, Necromancer, or Archivist will perform the ability as normal.
